title: ZZ'Rot Portal bug
body:
Okay so im playing a normal for the OCE event, causally using the zz'rot because i assumed it was fixed by now but god i was wrong. The enemy turret before the inhib was taken down. I had zz'rot placed down beforehand (which is what helped us take the tower but the think is, instead of going for the inhib it went straight for the tower dealing damage to its healthbar. 

What im getting at is you can damage the nexus towers without taking down the inhibs. Riot please

replies.body:
You sure that all inhibs were still up?

Also, [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) is the board you should post this on.
